name: pnp-sp-fx-aces-tuitions
title: Tuitions
shortDescription: This sample shows how to build an ACE with a card view to display outstanding payment for Tuitions and payment breakage.
longDescription: This sample shows how to build an ACE with a card view to display outstanding payment for Tuitions and payment breakage.

references.name: Viva Connections Extensibility guidance
references.description: Adaptive Card Extensions are client-side components that run in the context of a SharePoint page.
